name: spunkily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an energetic, confident, and determined way: He has a love interest in this episode, played spunkily by his young co-star. He comes home after months away to find his 16-year-old daughter spunkily surviving without him.
More examplesFewer examplesThe band spunkily delivered its rock set to an enthusiastic crowd.He is spunkily charismatic in this latest adaptation of the classic play.She's a spunkily irrepressible young woman married to a dull husband. The show is full of well-choreographed, spunkily sung numbers.
